Macro.correlationDescription: Measures how closely Bitcoin's price movement tracks the S&P 500 index.
Macro.interestRateDescription: Federal funds effective rate over the last 24 months.
Macro.dotPlotDescription: Each dot represents a Fed member's projection for the federal funds rate.

Crypto.logRegDescription: Visualizing Bitcoin's long-term price cycles and potential tops and bottoms.
Crypto.halvingDescription: Estimated time until the next Bitcoin block reward halving.

DCA.title: DCA Simulator
DCA.runToSeeResults: Run a simulation to see the results.

Optimizer.title: Portfolio Optimizer
Optimizer.description: Find the optimal allocation for your crypto portfolio using Modern Portfolio Theory. Select 2 or more assets.
Optimizer.resultsDescription: Each point represents an optimal portfolio for a given level of risk.
Optimizer.selectAndCalculate: Select assets and calculate to see the efficient frontier.

Alerts.cardDescription: Input a summary of recent economic news to generate relevant policy and market alerts.
Alerts.textareaPlaceholder: e.g., 'The Fed announced a 25 basis point rate hike. CPI data for last month came in higher than expected at 3.5%...'
Alerts.generatedDescription: AI-powered notifications based on your input.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Manage your application and display settings.
Settings.themeDescription: Select a light or dark theme for the interface.
Settings.animationsDescription: Enable or disable subtle UI animations.
